Department of Mechanical and Industrial Engineering     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Department of Mechanical and Industrial Engineering      Department of Mechanical and Industrial Engineering   Main Menu    Undergraduate           Admitted Students    Admissions    Accreditation    Courses    ME Major    IE Major    EM Major    Minors    Internships and Jobs    Student Groups    Student Profiles    Student Resources         Graduate           Admissions    Courses    International Programs    Master’s Programs    PhD Programs    PhD Dissertations    Post-Graduation Outcomes    Student Profiles    Student Resources         Research           Research Areas    Labs         Faculty and Staff           Department Head    Core Faculty    Affiliate Faculty    Emeritus Faculty    Staff    Open Positions         News           Department Seminars    News         About           Mechanical Engineering    Industrial Engineering    Energy Engineering    Advisory Board    Contact    Head's Message          Eyebrow menu    Giving    Alumni    College of Engineering Home    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search               View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Department of Mechanical and Industrial Engineering    Undergraduate programs    Undergraduate Admitted Students        Undergraduate Admitted Students       Welcome to the Department of Mechanical and Industrial Engineering!   Congratulations on your admission. In being selected for UIC’s next undergraduate class, you have taken the first step toward becoming a remarkable engineer.  Amazing new experiences await. As soon as you arrive on campus, you will be able to explore our cutting-edge research labs , get to know the faculty who will be responsible for your UIC education, and meet the other students with whom you will eventually join a close-knit network of more than 26,000 UIC Engineering alumni.  For now, all you need to focus on is preparing for the start of your UIC experience. Please watch your email for specific information and instructions that will come from the university, the College of Engineering, and the department. We can’t wait to see you on campus!           Visit UIC’s page for newly admitted students  UIC has a dedicated page for new undergraduate students. Start here to get all the information you will need as an incoming freshman or transfer student.   Go to the admitted students page        quote    I like UIC a lot. Engineering is about applying your knowledge to create things, and making something to put on the market. It’s not just about talking. You learn to make something that works.    Sin-Pui Fu | Class of 2016           Undergraduate           Admitted Students    Admissions    Accreditation    Courses    ME Major    IE Major    EM Major    Minors    Internships and Jobs    Student Groups    Student Profiles    Student Resources
